game.name: Submerge
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A deep-sea exploration company sends you and your friends to investigate a research facility that has mysteriously gone silent. Face terrifying events together, survive as a team, and uncover the truth hidden within the depths.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A deep-sea exploration company sends you and your friends to investigate a research facility that has mysteriously gone silent. Face terrifying events together, survive as a team, and uncover the truth hidden within the depths.
